page.title: 17Clubs in Whipsnade
page.content: WHIPSNADE WOMENS INSTITUTE meets the first Wednesday of the month in the village hall.After the business part of the evening the members listen to speakers on various subjects.Then comes that welcome cup of tea & cakes & the hall hums with laughter & conversation. Membership 25 - 30.There is a sales table where members can sell items giving 10% to club funds.Once a year a Bingo evening is held to raise funds for either cancer research or blind. WHIPSNADE FLOWER GROUP meet once a month from April to November.Members bring flowers,foliage & containers to the village hall & they are shown by a demonstrator how to arrange them in different settings from table arrangements to church pedestals. The 25 to 30 members pay a subscription of Â£5 per year,guests pay Â£1 per meeting.
